articles.description: Thanks to its latest update, the Google Camera app now lets you permanently turn off its Auto Night Sight mode. The feature is available for the Pixel 4A 5G and the Pixel 5, which introduced the option of enabling it automatically.
articles.content:
It can now be permanently turned off on the Pixel 4A 5G and Pixel 5
The Pixel 5 and 4A 5G (pictured) can enable Night Sight mode automatically.
